attributes.additional_details: To stop the country's vulnerable and elderly from dying
attributes.background:
Begin widespread testing of people that have symptoms of covid19 without the need to have direct contact or travel. By refusing to test we are being denied the right to our health. 

https://www.who.int/news-room/fact-sheets/detail/human-rights-and-health

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
